Class GameOptionVersionException

java.lang.Object

              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
                  soc.game.GameOptionVersionException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameOptionVersionException
extends java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

This exception indicates game option(s) too new for a client.

Since:
1.1.07
Author:
Jeremy D Monin
See Also:
GameOption.optionsMinimumVersion(Hashtable), GameOption.optionsNewerThanVersion(int, boolean, boolean, Hashtable), Serialized Form

problemOptionsList

public java.lang.String problemOptionsList()
Build the list of "problem options" as a string, separated by "," (Message.SEP2).

Returns:
list of options (and values?) too new, or "" if none
